name: Kula World
description:
A Kula beach-ball is not one of man’s toughest creations. In fact, its thin inflatable surface is quite easily punctured by sharp objects, intense heat or falls from a very great height. Unfortunately, the 200 devilishly designed stages of Kula World™ are full of such hazards, all ready and waiting to burst your bubble. 

It’ll take quick thinking and some nifty ball control skills to guide your Kula ball safely through each stage, collecting keys to unlock the exit – and with Two Player showdowns the fun lasts even longer. Download Kula World™ today and have a ball!
